questions.quote: Chapter one. In order to manage risk we must first understand risk. How do you spot risk? How do you avoid risk and what makes it so risky?
We're with the FBI. You wanna tell us about your cable hook-up?
We could argue all night over who took the napkins. The point is in today's modern world it just doesn't seem relevant.
You got it. Hey Jerry, do me a favor. The next time you see that lineswoman ask her how those ball boys get those jobs. I would love to be able to do that.
Scott!  Remember what we talked about the other day?  George is into it.
Well it seems the engagement of her ffriend George has left her feeling bitter and hostile.
Uh, you are kidding me. How am I supposed to get to this meeting?
Uh, he's this guy who used to live in the building and they keep calling us to see the baby.
Oh, well then I better get going otherwise George will make me buy him lunch to make up for that big salad he bought me yesterday.
Okay. I'm gonna check my machine first.  Picking someone up at the airport, jury duty, waiting for cable guy...
